project.description:
This is a test that starts and executes a CloVR Comparative pipeline run with local credentials
Used 6 Rhizobium full Genbank (.gbk) files for testing. The accession IDs are: NC_011369,NC_012850,NC_008380,NC_007761,NC_010994,NC_020059

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e source /opt/vappio-scripts/clovrEnv.sh
DATE=`date +"%m-%d-%Y-%T" | sed -e 's/:/_/g'`
vp-add-dataset --tag-name=rhizobium_genbank_tag_local -o /mnt/user_data/comparative/rhizobium/NC_011369.gbk /mnt/user_data/comparative/rhizobium/NC_012850.gbk /mnt/user_data/comparative/rhizobium/NC_007761.gbk /mnt/user_data/comparative/rhizobium/NC_008380.gbk /mnt/user_data/comparative/rhizobium/NC_010994.gbk /mnt/user_data/comparative/rhizobium/NC_020059.gbk
vp-describe-protocols --config-from-protocol=clovr_comparative \ -c input.GENBANK_TAGS=rhizobium_genbank_tag_local \ -c params.OUTPUT_PREFIX=rhizobium \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_NAME='local' \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_CREDENTIAL='local' \ -c cluster.TERMINATE_ONFINISH=false \ -c pipeline.PIPELINE_DESC="Hudson CloVR Comparative Test local ${DATE}" \ > /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE}
TASK_NAME=`vp-run-pipeline --print-task-name --pipeline-config /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE} --overwrite`
if [ "$?" == "1" ]; then echo "vp-run-pipeline failed to run" exit 1 fi
vp-describe-task --name local --exit-code --block $TASK_NAME
exit $?
